tables.name: nyc_taxi
tables.sql: select VendorID, to_timestamp(tpep_pickup_datetime,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss XXXXX') as tpep_pickup_datetime, to_timestamp(tpep_dropoff_datetime,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss XXXXX') as tpep_dropoff_datetime, passenger_count, trip_distance, pickup_longitude, pickup_latitude, dropoff_longitude, dropoff_latitude, fare_amount, tip_amount, total_amount, buildingid_pickup, buildingid_dropoff, buildingtext_pickup, buildingtext_dropoff from old_nyc_taxi where (pickup_longitude between -180 and 180) and (pickup_latitude between -90 and 90) and (dropoff_longitude between -180 and 180) and  (dropoff_latitude between -90 and 90)
